Azimuth.app.welcomebox: div( h3(HTML("Please upload a dataset to map to our human lung reference")), "Upload a counts matrix from an scRNA-seq dataset of human lung in one of the following formats: hdf5, rds, h5ad, h5seurat", width = 12 )
Azimuth.app.refdescriptor: This reference consists of 65,662 human lung cells (10x Genomics v2) from Travaglini et al. 2020. Cells were sourced from three donor patients and from all lung tissue compartments (bronchi, bronchiole, alveoli) as well as circulating blood. For testing, we also provide a demo dataset of 10,360 human lung cells from Vieira-Braga et al, 2019 (Drop-seq), which is loaded automatically with the 'Load demo dataset' button or available for download here.
